modShortDescription: This adds the option '2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 20, 22' hours as Day Light Length options in addition to the default '12, 14, 16, 18' for those who want really short or really long days.
modDescription:
This adds the option ‘2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 20, 22′ hours as Day Light Length options in addition to the default ’12, 14, 16, 18’ for those who want really short or really long days.

These options are also added as available filter choices in the server browser.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/RELXIX-7DTD/A20_XML_Modlets/tree/main/RELXIX_UIMENU_MoreDayLightLengthOptions)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25785-relxix-a20-xml-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Red Eagle LXIX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/red-eagle-lxix/)
